title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

title: USB-C Charging Cable
description: Fast charging USB-C cable with durable braided design, 6ft length. Compatible with all USB-C devices.

title: Portable Power Bank 20000mAh
description: High capacity portable charger with dual USB ports and LED indicator. Charges phones multiple times.

title: Smart Watch Fitness Tracker
description: Waterproof fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery. Track your health goals.

title: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with customizable keys and wrist rest. Cherry MX switches for gaming.

title: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with high precision sensor, programmable buttons, and RGB lighting.

title: 4K Webcam with Microphone
description: Ultra HD webcam with built-in microphone and auto-focus. Perfect for video calls and streaming.

title: Bluetooth Speaker Waterproof
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound, waterproof design, and 12-hour battery life.

title: Laptop Stand Adjustable
description: Aluminum laptop stand with adjustable height and angle. Improves posture and cooling.

title: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, touch controls, and wireless charging case.
